parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.66

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Triggers

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Markers

</value></part><part><name>gr3</name>=<value> Locations

</value></part><part><name>gr4</name>=<value> Positions

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns given list of [[Object]]s and/or [[Position]]s that are in the given area, area defined by a trigger, marker, location or array.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> positions '''inAreaArray''' area

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> positions: [[Array]] of [[Object]]s and/or [[Position]]s

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> area: [[Object]], [[Location]] or [[String]] - the defined area:
* [[Object]] - trigger
* [[Location]] - location
* [[String]] - marker name

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]]: [[Object]]s and/or [[Position]]s inside the trigger area

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> positions '''inAreaArray''' [center, a, b, angle, isRectangle, c]

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> positions: [[Array]] - [[Object]]s and/or [[Position]]s to check

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> center: [[Array]] - center of the area in format [[Position3D]], [[Position2D]]

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> a: [[Number]] - x axis (x / 2)

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> b: [[Number]] - y axis (y / 2)

</value></part><part><name>p25</name>=<value> angle: [[Number]] - (Optional, default 0) rotation angle

</value></part><part><name>p26</name>=<value> isRectangle: [[Boolean]] - (Optional, default [[false]]) [[true]] if rectangle, [[false]] if ellipse

</value></part><part><name>p27</name>=<value> c: [[Number]] - (Optional, default -1: unlimited) z axis (z / 2)

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Array]]: [[Object]]s and/or [[Position]]s inside the area

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[vehicles]] [[inAreaArray]] myTrigger;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[allUnits]] [[inAreaArray]] "myMarker";</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>[[allPlayers]] [[inAreaArray]] myLocation;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value> <code>[[allDead]] [[inAreaArray]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[100, 100, 0], 20, 30, 45, [[false]], 10];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[inArea]], [[triggerArea]]
</value></part></template>


<dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on June 11, 2017 - 21:33 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Tankbuster|Tankbuster]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
The array you send the command can be filtered. For example:
<code>[[vehicles]] [[select]] { _x [[isKindOf]] "StaticWeapon" } [[inAreaArray]] "myMarker"</code>
Will return only the statics inside the given marker
</dd>
</dl></root>
